extendedInfo.description: Set goals.  Discover apps.  Connect them.  Get fit.CarePass is open to everyone, but built just for you.  CarePass connects the health and fitness apps you love to help you reach the wellness goals that are uniquely yours.Features:-       Set unique wellness goals-       Discover top mobile health and fitness apps-       Connect the apps into CarePass and use them to achieve your goals-       Track your progress with inspiring visuals-       Get motivated by joining in the community and learning from others like you With all the health apps and diets out there, getting started on a path to a healthier life can be overwhelming. And everyone could use a little extra help to find tools and apps that will help them achieve their goals. Thatâs why you need a partner like CarePass.

reviews.title: Galaxy S3 - not good
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this and it\'s the most glitchy app I\'ve ever encountered. Using the back button on the phone makes you reenter your pin, so every glitch when I needed to just go back one screen made me reenter my pin. It\'s not syncing. Adding my other apps was a challenge because I would get a blank white screen, and want sure it had added. Overall, a good idea but it doesn\'t work smoothly at all.
reviews.author: Memr\303\251 Savant

reviews.title: Terrible.
reviews.comment: Just like everything else Aetna does, this app is buggy, awkward and frustrating. Hoping my company picks a new company on our next cycle; the Marx Brothers would be more competent.
reviews.author: James Wagner

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Connect Apps
reviews.comment: One of the main features of this app is that it\'s supposed to connect your other health apps.  I tried and it doesn\'t work.  Bye bye CarePass, lemme know when you work the way you say you do.
reviews.author: Valerie Schoman

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: By far the worst fitness tracking app I\'ve come across - do not bother it\'s terrible in every way
reviews.author: Paul Dunn

reviews.title: No proper sync
reviews.comment: I tempted to use this app as it is claiming to sync data from my favorite apps like loseit, run keeper and many other. But it doesn\'t seem to sync properly. Home screen of app is not comprehensive. On making goal for weight loss of 3500 calories it doesn\'t take simple data of calories deficits from lose it. I would prefer to add exercise manually in lose it rather.
reviews.author: Jaykumar Sejpal

reviews.title: Can\'t even start
reviews.comment: I can\'t even use this app because when I try to create an account it shut down halfway through. Later attempts said my email was not in the right format, I even tried multiple addresses with no effect.
reviews.author: Josh Douglas

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: A real pain just to register and log in. 75% of the time the password field simply won\'t accept inputs.  Then they ask you to use another security field by entering a PIN.  Guess what, this field doesn\'t work either.  Extremely frustrating.  Needs serious debugging!
reviews.author: Michael Coughlin

reviews.title: Too buggy
reviews.comment: Great idea - not fully functional for Android users - could not sync all my apps and some of the apps on the site are only available with Apple phones. Just needs more development work. I ended up uninstalling because with the limitations, there is no advantage to using it
reviews.author: Cynthia Wheelehan
